pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ṭhitā nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:7.2: “Na ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:8.1: Na ṭhitena nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk70:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
